sqlset.sql-query: INSERT INTO V2_THREAD (THREAD_ID, THREAD_TITLE, THREAD_CONTENT, PASSWD, ATTACHMENT_ID, VIEW_CNT, CREATE_ID, CREATE_NAME, CREATION_DATE, PARENT_THREAD_ID, REPLY_DEPTH, DEL_YN, COMMENT_CNT, BOARD_ID) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 0, ?, ?, sysdate, ?, ?, 0, 0, ?) -- (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

SELECT T.THREAD_ID, T.BOARD_ID, T.THREAD_TITLE, T.THREAD_CONTENT, T.PASSWD, T.ATTACHMENT_ID, T.VIEW_CNT, T.CREATE_ID, T.CREATE_NAME, T.CREATION_DATE, T.MODIFY_ID, T.MODIFY_NAME, T.PARENT_THREAD_ID, T.REPLY_DEPTH, T.DEL_YN, T.COMMENT_CNT FROM V2_THREAD T WHERE T.THREAD_ID = ?

SELECT T.THREAD_ID, T.BOARD_ID, T.THREAD_TITLE, T.THREAD_CONTENT, T.PASSWD, T.ATTACHMENT_ID, T.VIEW_CNT, T.CREATE_ID, T.CREATE_NAME, T.CREATION_DATE, T.MODIFY_ID, T.MODIFIED_DATE, T.PARENT_THREAD_ID, T.REPLY_DEPTH, T.DEL_YN, T.COMMENT_CNT FROM V2_THREAD T WHERE T.BOARD_ID = ?
UPDATE V2_THREAD T SET DEL_YN = 1 WHERE T.THREAD_ID = ?

UPDATE V2_THREAD SET THREAD_TITLE = ?, THREAD_CONTENT = ?, ATTACHMENT_ID = ?, MODIFY_ID = ?, MODIFY_NAME = ?,
WHERE THREAD_ID = ?
UPDATE V2_THREAD SET VIEW_CNT = ? WHERE THREAD_ID = ?
UPDATE V2_THREAD SET COMMENT_CNT = ? WHERE THREAD_ID = ?
